_A_LOADING_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: The ALoading component displays a loading spinner with text over the content when the is-loading property is set to true. It is used to block content and show a spinner until the loading process is complete.
_A_LOADING_PROPS_IS_LOADING_DESCRIPTION_: Determines whether the loading indicator should be displayed. If set to true, the loading indicator will appear over the component's content.
